projects.title: Data Migration Framework
projects.description: Developed a scalable Data Migration Framework for a leading global online payments company using Python, AWS, GCS, and BigQuery. Reduced data migration time by 20%, and improved scalability by 30%, ensuring smoother, more efficient data transfer processes across cloud platforms.

projects.title: Lynx Framework Optimization
projects.description: Implemented key optimizations to the Lynx Framework, enhancing data linkage accuracy and operational efficiency by 35%. Optimized the Locality-Sensitive Hashing (LSH) algorithm, leading to a 40% reduction in nearest neighbor search time. Streamlined feature aggregation pipelines, reducing processing latency by 25%.

projects.title: Reporting Framework
projects.description: Developed on-demand merchant reporting solutions, improving data accuracy by 15% and reducing report generation time by 25%. Contributed to the Argo Framework for dynamic and efficient report generation at scale.

projects.title: Fuzzy Control System for Forest Fire Detection
projects.description: Developed a real-time forest fire detection system utilizing Python-based machine learning algorithms and fuzzy logic. Achieved 90% accuracy in predicting the likelihood and severity of forest fires, showcasing the ability to apply data science solutions to critical environmental challenges.

projects.title: Joint Image Compression & Encryption
projects.description: Created an algorithm for joint image compression and encryption using lossless JPEG2000 and RC4 encryption. Achieved a compression ratio of 5.2, 99.69% NPCR, and 47.63% UACI in processed images.

projects.title: Digital Image Compression
projects.description: Designed an algorithm for digital image compression using K-means clustering and PCA. Achieved a compression ratio of 2.8 with 55-70% compression and a PSNR of 30 and above. Collaborated with a team of 4 members.

projects.title: Image Classification using CNNs
projects.description: Led a team of 4 in developing a machine learning-based CNN model for image classification, utilizing the CIFAR10 dataset. Achieved a high accuracy rate of 87.44% on the training dataset and 82.5% on the testing dataset.

projects.title: YouTube Spam Comment Filter
projects.description: Developed and implemented a machine learning algorithm for binary classification of spam and non-spam comments on YouTube videos. Achieved an accuracy rate of 96.21% through training on multiple datasets.

projects.title: School Chale Ham
projects.description: A comprehensive platform for academic blogs catering to K-12 education. Efficient blog creation, management, and presentation. Backend powered by Express.js with MongoDB data storage. Frontend developed using Next.js for optimal performance.

projects.title: Bihar COVID Help
projects.description: Built a website to share information about the official notifications released by the government during the COVID-19 pandemic. Shared resources like oxygen, medicine, hospital beds, etc. Gathered a workforce of volunteer doctors to provide help in emergency cases. Shared useful contacts.

projects.title: Android Bloatware Removal Guide
projects.description: A basic blog webpage created for the Android bloatware removal guide. Simple and informative design for easy navigation.
